body:
The problem with using the system pager by default is that once it is enabled some people will want to disable it (e.g. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12166295/disable-all-paging-in-git). This will require additional command line options or environment variables and more documentation, not to mention additional effort to implement, test and support this feature.

BTW, `go help` output is available online: https://golang.org/doc/cmd and https://golang.org/cmd/go/
